title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message Delivery Feedback Details
description: Provide details for the delivery feedback for a single message in the Message Execution.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Feedback Status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Provide status of a delivery attempt.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Exclude Code
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Provide top level exclusion reason, like typology rule, mandatory parameter missing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Exclude Reason
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Provide exclusion subcode, like exact typology rule-id.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Failure Reason
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Failure reason for a failed delivery attempt.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Failure Code
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Failure code for a failed delivery attempt.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Failure Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Classifies whether it is a soft bounce or hard bounce.

meta:enum.soft: The reason for failed delivery is temporary.
meta:enum.hard: The reason for failed delivery is permanent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Failure Category
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Classifies whether it is a sync bounce or async bounce.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Retry Count
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Number of failed attempts before the current event. The retryCount starts with '0', for message which is sent in first attempt will have 'retryCount' as 0.
